attributes.title: Live 🥰 laugh 😆 love 🥺 make 🤪 Obama 😳 the 😼 president 😌 again 🥳
attributes.review: This app is awfully disgusting and has to be removed immediately! I clearly didn’t ask a racist orange man to be our president in  2020 this year only got worse because of trump and the police’s decisions, I clearly want another president to make good decisions and to make America great again oh and also ✨💞trump you should fall off a chair🌈⚡️🧚a rope will catch you 🌸🦋💫☺️

attributes.title: 🧚🏻‍♂️💫You delete TikTok, We’ll delete your☀️🧚🏻
attributes.review:
You really thought GenZ wasn’t going down without a fight? Sorry bud but if your app gets once star I automatically gets deleted off the App Store. 

Your the worst person that has ever existed and you do not deserve to be in the White House! How dare you make a mockery of our country? “Make American great again”? Honey we were fantastic when Obama was in office. 

Face it buddy, if you get re-elected again the ONLY REASON is because GenZ is old enough to vote or run. Be lucky. We are more powerful, smarter, and better leaders than you ever were. We ruined your rally; don’t think we won’t ruin hour life!

#savebarron

attributes.title: This only deserves 1 star
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and it was trash. It’s built terribly. Everytime I open it it glitches me out. Then my phone gets hot and starts taking screenshots. I have over a thousand screenshots!! My phone almost exploded in my hands and I’m broke I can’t afford another. So forget this terrible poopy app! If you download, give it the rating it deserves. I’m highly disappointed.

attributes.title: Horrible glitches
attributes.review:
I open the app to see that it is for a racist, homophobic, islamphobic , old man they doesn’t like anyone that isn’t the lightest shade of white , such a horrible glitch 
Did I mention that the cops that shot Briana Tayler have still not been convicted for their crimes and that this is sadly the same story for many other people of color ESPECIALLY black people in the USA
Abolish ICE to free Hispanic kid’s from cages and from getting “lost”
White privileged is real and so is police brutality 
Being Blue is an option being Black is not ,you CAN’T be born blue ,but you are born BLACK, blue lives are NOT a thing 

Thank you for listening to my ted talk and remember to vote blue no matter who 💅✨🦞🥔🪑⚡️🧚💫💖

attributes.title: Nope 🍊👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽
